item.name: search.merchants
item.param:
merchants\[\d+\]\.id, merchants\[\d+\]\.name, merchants\[\d+\]\.shortName, merchants\[\d+\]\.headForWeb, merchants\[\d+\]\.longitude, merchants\[\d+\]\.latitude, merchants\[\d+\]\.area\.name, merchants\[\d+\]\.code, merchants\[\d+\]\.businessAddress, merchants\[\d+\]\.businessTime, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantTelephone, merchants\[\d+\]\.category\.id, merchants\[\d+\]\.category\.name, merchants\[\d+\]\.info, merchants\[\d+\]\.favourPloy, merchants\[\d+\]\.memberGroup, merchants\[\d+\]\.memberGroup\.memberCount,
merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.commentCount, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.favCount, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.consumeCount, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.creditScore, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.averageGradeSrc, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.creditGrade\.value, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.creditGrade\.label, merchants\[\d+\]\.merchantReferenceStatistic\.creditGrade\.htmlImg,
